plot: Tommy wants to beat his school-mates in a cart-race. He is not much of a boy to stand up against them, then a ghost appears helping him...
title: Tommy and the Ghost
plot_es: Tommy wants to beat his school-mates in a cart-race. He is not much of a boy to stand up against them, then a ghost appears helping him...
plot_en: Tommy wants to beat his school-mates in a cart-race. He is not much of a boy to stand up against them, then a ghost appears helping him...
